title: ccwow
author: ccwow
content: I'm auctioning 2 pieces of wownero art, oil painted.https://imgur.com/a/wg6PKPyContact me directly with an offer I can't refuse or simply take part in the auction.Starting price is 0 wow.such.exe The 1st one - "Infinite Wow Eyes" - You gave a/way the love I gave.2nd - "Wownero Pokeball" - Wow such skillz.

comments.author: jwinterm
comments.body: Do they haz ze NFTz tho?

comments.author: ccwow
comments.body: Quote from: jwinterm on November 03, 2022, 11:27:54 PMDo they haz ze NFTz tho?They are on https://suchwow.xyz/ , life is just wow, NFTz for what wh3n you can have memes.Such wow...
